63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The people of Mecca asked Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) to show them a miracle. So he showed them the moon split in two halves between which they saw the Hira' mountain

chapter.eng-name: The splitting of the moon (into two pieces)
